list_definition.definition: done, given etc by choice, not by accident or because of being forced (often without pay)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Their action was completely voluntary – nobody asked them to do that.

list_definition.definition: run, financed etc by such actions, contributions etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He does a lot of work for a voluntary organization.
